SourceText: ParentText is easiest to use when you receive content as videos, images and text. However, your data bundle and bandwidth may not support videos. To save on data, you can choose to receive the same content with a smaller audio file or as text. How would you like to receive ParentText?
text: I-ParentText ilula kakhulu ukuyisebenzisa uma uthola umthamo wayo ngamavidiyo, izithombe kanye nemiyalezo ebhaliwe. Kodwa ke kungenzeka ukuthi i-data lakho noma ukudonsa kwe-network kungakweseki ekutholeni amavidiyo. Ukonga i-data ungakhetha ukuthola okuqukethwe yividiyo ngeziqephu ezimfishane ezishicilelwe ngephimbo noma ezibhaliwe. Ufisa ukuyithola ngaluphi uhlobo i-ParentText?

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
Are you a WOMAN or MAN?
Is @fields.child_nickname a girl or a boy?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Is your child a girl or a boy?
text: Ingabe ingane yakho intombazane noma umfana?

SourceText: Which province do you live in?
Please provide us with your child's first name.
text: Sicela usinikeze igama lokuqala lengane yakho.

SourceText: Please type "N" if you prefer not to answer.
text: Sicela ubhale u “C” uma ukhetha ukungaphenduli.

SourceText: How should we print your name on the certificate?
text: Silibhale kanjani igama lakho kwisitifiteki sakho?

SourceText: ✅Your personal information is safe and private. Your name and information will not be public, but your responses will be kept and could be used by researchers to learn how to support families like yours.
text: ✅Imniningwane yakho yangasese iphephile  futhi iyimfihlo. Igama lakho neminye imniningwane yakho ngeke ibe sesidlangalaleni, kodwa izimpendulo zakho zizogcinwa futhi zisetshenziswe abacwaningi ukuze bafunde ukweseka imindeni efana neyakho.

SourceText: ❌You can stop when you want. Just type {STOP}
Press YES if you agree with this. Type "EXIT" if you do not want to participate.
text: Cindezela “YEBO” uma uvumelana nalokhu. Bhala “PHUMA” uma ungathandi ukubamba iqhaza.

SourceText: That is wonderful, thank you so much!
Can you please confirm that you are 16 years old or older?
text: Sicela uqinisekise ukuthi uneminyaka eyi-16 ubudala noma ngaphezulu?

SourceText: Are you sure you do not want to get these messages? If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type NO. If you made a mistake, please press BACK and choose another option.
text: Uqinisekile ukuthi awufuni ukuthola le milayezo? Uma ungasafuni ukuthola eminye imilayezo, sicela ubhale ukuthi CHA. Uma wenze iphutha, sicela ucindezele EMUVA bese ukhetha okunye.

SourceText: If you ever return to participate in the programme, type "HELLO".
text: Uma kwenzeka ubuya uzohlanganyela ohlelweni, bhala ukuthi "SAWUBONA".

SourceText: We hope to see you again soon, and we wish you a happy and peaceful day!
text: Sithembe ukuthi sizokubona maduzane, futhi sikufisela usuku olunenjabulo nokuthula!

SourceText: Sorry, ParentText is only for people over the age of 16. Do you confirm that you are under the age of 16?
text: Siyaxolisa, i-ParetText ngeyabantu abaneminyaka engaphezu kweyi-16 kuphela. Ingabe uyaqinisekisa ukuthi ungaphansi kweminyaka eyi-16 ubudala?

SourceText: If you want to experience ParentText, you can always share it with your parents or caregivers.
text: Uma uthanda ukusebenzisa i-ParentText, ungakuxoxa nabazali noma abanakekeli bakho.

SourceText: Here is a video that shows how to use ParentText.
text: Nansi ividiyo ebonisa indlela yokusebenzisa i-ParentText.

SourceText: When was @fields.child_nickname born? Enter their date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Wazalwa nini u @fields.child_nickname? Faka usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa ngalendlela elandelayo: DD/MM/YYYY. Isibonelo, uma ingane yakho yazalwa ngoMeyi 19, 2010, faka umhlaka-19/05/2010.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: When was your child born? Enter their date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Wazalwa nini @? Faka usuku lwabo lokuzalwa ngefomethi elandelayo: DD/MM/YYYY. Isibonelo, uma ingane yakho yazalwa ngoMeyi 19, 2010, faka umhlaka-19/05/2010.

SourceText: Sorry, this date is invalid. Please provide your child's date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Siyaxolisa, lolu suku akulona. Sicela unikeze usuku lokuzalwa lwengane yakho ngalendlela elandelayo: DD/MM/YYYY. Isibonelo, uma ingane yakho yazalwa ngoMeyi 19, 2010, faka umhlaka-19/05/2010.

SourceText: The date you entered is in the future. Please provide your child's date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Usuku olifakile isesikhathini esizayo. Sicela unikeze usuku yokuzalwa yengane yakho ngale ndlela elandelayo: DD/MM/YYYY. Isibonelo, uma ingane yakho yazalwa ngoMeyi 19, 2010, faka umhlaka-19/05/2010.

SourceText: Let's try again. Please provide your child's date of birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Ake sizame futhi. Sicela unikeze usuku lokuzalwa lwengane yakho ngale ndlela elandelayo: DD/MM/YYYY. Isibonelo, uma ingane yakho yazalwa ngoMeyi 19, 2010, faka umhlaka-19/05/2010.

SourceText: @fields.child_nickname is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old. Is that correct?
text: U@fields.child_nickname uneminyaka engu- @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)). Ingabe kuyikho lokho?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Your child is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old. Is that correct?
text: Ingane yakho ineminyaka engu-@(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)). Ingabe lokho kuliqiniso?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: @fields.child_nickname is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old.  Is that correct?
text: U@fields.child_nickname uneminyaka engu-@(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) yobudala. Ingabe kuyikho lokho?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Your teen is @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old.  Is that correct?
text: Umntwana wakho uneminyaka engu-@(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)). Ingabe lokho kuliqiniso?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: According to the date you provided, @fields.child_nickname would be @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old. ParentText is only for children aged 2-17. Please enter a valid date for your child's birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Ngogosuku olinikezile, @fields.child_nickname izoba @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) iminyaka yobudala. I-ParentText eyezingane ezineminyaka esukela ku-2-17 kuphela. Sicela ufake usuku okuyilo lokuzalwa kwengane yakho ngefomethi elandelayo: DD/MM/YYYY. Isibonelo, uma ingane yakho yazalwa ngoMeyi 19, 2010, faka umhlaka-19/05/2010.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: According to the date you provided, your child would be @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) years old. ParentText is only for children aged 2-17. Please enter a valid date for your child's birth in the following format: DD/MM/YYYY. For example, if your child was born on May 19, 2010, enter 19/05/2010.
text: Ngogosuku olinikezile, unmtwana wakho uzoba @(round_down(datetime_diff(results.date,now(),"M")/12)) iminyaka yobudala. I-ParentText eyezingane ezineminyaka esukela ku-2-17 kuphela. Sicela ufake usuku okuyilo lokuzalwa kwengane yakho ngefomethi elandelayo: DD/MM/YYYY. Isibonelo, uma ingane yakho yazalwa ngoMeyi 19, 2010, faka umhlaka 19/05/2010.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Welcome to ParentText! This chatbot has been designed with and for parents just like you. We hope you find it useful!
text: Wamukelekile kuParentText! Leli robhothi elikhulumayo lakhiwe ngabazali futhi lakhelwe abazali abafana nawe. Sithemba ukuthi uzolithola liwusizo!

SourceText: ParentText will help you with all of the children in your life, but in this programme, we are focusing on just one child at a time.
text: I-ParentText izokusiza ngazo zonke izingane empilweni yakho, kodwa kulolu hlelo sigxile enganeni eyodwa ngesikhathi.

SourceText: Would you like to go back to the previous messages?
That's okay. Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines.
text: Kulungile. Bhala ukuthi {HELP} noma nini uma ungathanda imininingwane yamasevisi ezimo eziphuthumayo noma amanye ama-hotline.

SourceText: Here are the contact details of your local emergency services:
text: Nansi imininingwane yokuxhumana nezindawo zangakini zosizo oluphuthumayo:

SourceText: Type {HELP} at any time if you would like the details of emergency services or other hotlines. Remember everything you say will be completely private!
text: Bhala ukuthi {HELP} noma nini uma ungathanda imininingwane yamasevisi ezimo eziphuthumayo noma amanye ama-hotline. Khumbula konke okushoyo kuzoba yimfihlo ngokuphelele!

SourceText: If you ever feel like talking privately to a trained professional, you can call:
text: Uma uzizwa sengathi ufuna ukukhuluma ngasese nomuntu oqeqeshiwe, ungashayela:

SourceText: Here are the contact details of your local medical services:
text: Nansi imininingwane yokuxhumana nezindawo zangakini zosizo lwezempilo:

SourceText: Are you currently facing an emergency?
Do you need some support with an emotional issue?
text: Ngabe udinga usizo mayelana nesimo esikuthinta emoyeni?

SourceText: Are you currently experiencing a health issue?
Are you experiencing an unsafe situation?
Do you need some urgent help?
Please type {MENU} to access resources and review completed modules, {PLAY} to receive a playful activity you can complete with your child, or {HELP} to access local support resources for a crisis.
text: Sicela ubhale ukuthi {MENU} ukuze ufinyelele izinsiza futhi ubuyekeze amamojuli aqediwe, {PLAY} ukuze uthole umsebenzi wokudlala ongawuqedela nengane yakho, noma {HELP} ukuze ufinyelele kwizinsiza zokukusekela zasendaweni zenhlekelele.

SourceText: You have not given consent to participate in this programme. Would you like to participate?
text: Awuhlinzekwanga ngemvume yokubamba iqhaza kulolu hlelo. Ungathanda ukubamba iqhaza?

SourceText: If you ever decide to participate in the programme, type HELLO.
text: Uma kwenzeka ufuna ukubamba iqhaza ohlelweni, bhala uthi SAWUBONA.

SourceText: Parenting is hard. ParentText may help. Would you like to continue your progress?
text: Ukukhulisa abantwana kunzima. i-ParentText ingasiza. Ungathanda ukuqhubeka nentuthuko yakho?

SourceText: That's okay. If you ever decide to come back, type HELLO.
text: Kulungile. Uma kwenzeka unquma ukubuya, bhala ukuthi SAWUBONA.

SourceText: You are already part of ParentText!
Staying in ParentText helps you and your child. Are you sure you want to exit the programme?
text: Ukuhlala ku-ParentText kusiza wena nengane yakho. Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukuphuma ohlelweni?

SourceText: If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type "EXIT".
text: Uma ungasathandi ukuthola le miyalezo, sicela uthayiphe “PHUMA”.

SourceText: If you made a mistake, please type "BACK".
text: Uma wenze iphutha, sicela ubhale igama elithi "EMUVA".

SourceText: Thank you for participating. If you want to return to the programme, type HELLO.
text: Siyabonga ngokuhlanganyela. Uma ufuna ukubuyela ohlelweni, bhala ukuthi SAWUBONA.

SourceText: We hope to see you again soon!
We are so glad you want to stick around! We will resume your progress tomorrow.
text: Siyajabula ukuthi usafuna ukuhlala! Sizoqhubeka nenqubekela phambili yakho kusasa.

SourceText: This feature will be available once you have completed registration. It won’t take long. Please continue your progress!
text: Lokhu kuzotholakala uma usuqedile ukubhalisa. Ngeke kuthathe isikhathi eside. Sicela uqhubeke nentuthuko yakho!

SourceText: The menu will be available once you have completed registration. It won’t take long. Please continue your progress!
text: Imenyu izotholakala uma usuqedile ukubhalisa. Ngeke kuthathe isikhathi eside. Sicela uqhubekele phambili!

SourceText: In this course, you will complete @fields.c_n_mod lessons. You will receive a new lesson each day. Your first lesson is @results.name.
text: Kulesi sifundo, uzoqedela @fields.c_n_mod izifundo. Uzothola isifundo esisha usuku ngalunye. Isifundo sakho sokuqala sithi @results.name.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You have completed @fields.c_n_mod_compl out of @fields.c_n_mod lessons in this course. Today's lesson is @results.name.
text: Uqedele @fields.c_n_mod_compl ezifundweni ze-@fields.c_n_mod kulesi sifundo. Isifundo sanamuhla sithi @results.name.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Let’s get started. Press NEXT to begin.
text: Ake siqale. Cindezela okuthi OKULANDELAYO ukuze uqalise.

SourceText: Well done. You're ready to start the programme.
You only have the following lesson to complete:

note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Which lesson would you like to complete?

note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You haven't started to work on a course yet.
You have only started the course
Would you like support on it?
That's okay. You can access more information at any time in the Main Menu. Just type {MENU}.
text: Kulungile. Ungafinyelela olwazini olwengeziwe nganoma yisiphi isikhathi kwi menyu nkulu. Vele ubhale ukuthi {Menyu}.

SourceText: You haven't completed a lesson yet.
Which course do you want to review?

note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.count is a number (counter for list)

SourceText: You haven't completed any of the lessons in this course.
You have only completed the following lesson:
Would you like to review it?
That's okay. You can come back here at any time to review it.
text: Kulungile. Ungabuya lapha noma nini ukuzolibuyekeza.

SourceText: You have completed @fields.n_s_modules_compl lessons within this course. Which lesson do you want to review?
text: Usiqedile isifundo se-@fields.n_s_modules_compl kulezi zifundo. Isiphi isifundo ofuna ukusibuyekeza?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.
Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated. @results.count is a number (counter for list)

SourceText: Which course would you like to complete next?
What would you like to do next?
What would you like to do?
Do you want to begin now or tomorrow?
text: Ingabe ufuna ukuqala manje noma kusasa?

SourceText: It takes only 5 days to complete this first course and earn your parenting certificate.
text: Kuthatha izinsuku ezi-5 kuphela ukuqeda lesi sifundo futhi uzuze isitifiketi sakho sobuzali.

SourceText: 🎉You did it!🎉 You have completed the course @results.name. Here's your course certificate. Congratulations!
text: 🎉Uphumelele!🎉 Usiqedile isifundo @results.name. Nasi isitifiketi sakho. Halala!
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Remember, you can always return to ParentText and get extra support or review this information. Just type {MENU}.
text: Khumbula, ungakwazi njalo ukubuyela ku-ParentText futhi uthole ukwesekwa okwengeziwe noma ubuyekeze lolu lwazi. Vele ubhale ukuthi {MENU}.

SourceText: ParentText has begun. You are just 5 days away from earning your parenting certificate. Are you ready to complete your registration and get started?
text: IParentText isiqalile. Usalelwe yizinsuku ezi-5 kuphela ukuthi uzuze isitifiketi sakho sokuba ngumzali. Ingabe usukulungele ukuqedela ukubhalisa kwakho futhi uqalise?

SourceText: Select one of the options below:
It seems like you've got some catching up to do! Do you want to complete your previous unfinished lesson or start a new lesson?
text: Kubukeka engazuthi nokuthile okusamele ukwenze! Uyafuna ukuqedela lokhu ongakuqedanga kwisifundo esidlule noma uqala isifundo esisha?

SourceText: Do you want to catch up and proceed to the next lesson?
text: Ingabe uyafuna ukuqhubeka futhi uqhubekele esifundweni esilandelayo?

SourceText: You're almost finished with this course! You only have 1 unfinished lesson. What would you like to do?
text: Usuzoqeda ngalesi sifundo! Unesifundo esisodwa esingaqediwe. Ungathanda ukwenzani?

SourceText: Press a number on your keypad:
1. Finish this lesson and earn my course certificate
text: 1. Qeda lesi sifundo futhi uzuze isitifiketi sesifundo

SourceText: You're almost finished with this course! You have @fields.c_n_mod_started unfinished lessons. What would you like to do?
text: Usuzoqeda ngalesi sifundo! Una-@fields.c_n_mod_started wezifundo ezingaqediwe. Ungathanda ukwenzani?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: 1. Complete unfinished lessons to earn my course certificate
text: 1. Qedela izifundo ezingakaqedwa ukuze ngithole isitifiketi sami

SourceText: It’s time to get started on your course, @results.name. Are you ready?
text: Isikhathi sokuthi uqalise isifundo sakho, @results.name. Usukulungele?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: We've got another lesson ready for you! Are you ready?
We hope this was helpful! You can access the Main Menu at any time by typing {MENU}.
text: Sithemba ukuthi lokhu kube usizo! Ungakwazi ukufinyelela iMeniyu Enkulu nomanini ngokubhala ukuthi {MENU}.

SourceText: To invite someone to join, share this link!
text: Ukuze umeme othile ukujoyina, thumela le-link!

SourceText: You have reached the end of this lesson! 🎉
What do you want to do next?
That's okay. You can access more information at any time in the Main Menu.
text: Kulungile. Ungafinyelela ulwazi olwengeziwe nganoma yisiphi isikhathi kwi-Menyu enkulu.

SourceText: 🎉You did it! Congratulations!🎉 You have completed all the available courses. Well done!
text: 🎉Usebenzile! Halala!🎉 Uziqede zonke izifundo ezitholakalayo. Wenze kahle kakhulu!

SourceText: You have completed @fields.c_n_mod_compl out of @fields.c_n_mod lessons.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.
Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You are currently working on the course @results.name.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Your current media setting is Text, Images, and Videos.
text: Isilungiselelo sakho semidiya samanje sithi Umbhalo, Izithombe, namavidiyo.

SourceText: Your current media setting is Text, Images, and Audio.
text: Isilungiselelo sakho semidiya samanje sithi Umbhalo, Izithombe, Nomsindo.

SourceText: Your current media setting is Text and Images Only.
text: Isilungiselelo sakho semidiya samanje Esombhalo kanye Nezithombe Kuphela.

SourceText: Would you like to change it?

note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You completed the ParentText demo. Type {RESET} and then {FACSTART} to re-start from the beginning.
text: Uyiqedile idemo yeParentText. Bhala ukuthi {RESET} bese {FACSTART} ukuze uqale kabusha kusukela ekuqaleni.

SourceText: It looks like ParentText isn't working for you. Can you tell us why?
text: Kubukeka sengathi i ParentText ayikusebenzeli. Ungasichazela ukuthi kungani?

SourceText: ParentText should only take 10 minutes a day to complete. Would you like to try a new lesson now?
text: Kumele kuthathe imizuzu ewu 10 ngosuku ukuqeda. Uyafisa ukuzama isifundo esisha manje?

SourceText: Oh no! Why is ParentText not helpful?
text: Cha Kungani i ParentText ingelona usizo?

SourceText: It may seem like spending one-on-one time with your child won't help you with their behaviour right away, but patience is key. This time together helps you understand each other better and build a strong bond. When children feel heard and supported like this, it often helps improve their behaviour over time.
text: Kungabukeka sengathi ukuchitha isikhathi esibalulekile nengane yakho ngeke kukusize ngokushesha ukuziphatha kwakhe, kepha ukubekezela kubalulekile. Isikhathi enisichitha ndawonye kusiza ukuthi nazane kangcono nokwakha ubudlelwane buqine ngamandla. Uma izingane bezizwa benakekelwa futhi besekwa kusiza ukunyusa indlela abaziphatha ngayo ekuhambeni kwesikhathi.

SourceText: Would you like to try a new lesson now to learn more about one-on-one time?
text: Uyafisa ukuzama isifundo esisha manje ukuze ufunde ngokuchitha isikhathi esibalulekile?

SourceText: I might know some resources that can help.
Feeling sad, stressed, or having trouble with your child's behaviour? 😟 These places can help: 💡
text: Uzizwa udangele, une stress, noma unobunzima ngendlela ingane yakho eziphatha ngayo? Lezindawo zingakusiza

SourceText: Take care of yourself! 😊 Your local clinic is here to help with any health problems. If you need extra support, here are some free helplines: ☎️
text: Zinakekele! Umtholampilo oseduze nawe ungakusiza ngezinkinga zempilo. Uma udinga ukwesekwa, nazi izinombolo zezingcingo zamahala zosizo: ☎️

SourceText: Seeing or going through violence can be scary and confusing. 😔 But there are people who can help you and your child! 💕
text: Ukubhekana nodlame kungaba isikhathi esithusayo futhi esididayo. Kukhona abantu abangasiza wena nengane yakho! 💕

SourceText: A lot of our energy goes into helping the person struggling with substance abuse. While that’s important, you and your family need support too! 💖 Find help for everyone below: ⬇️
text: Amandla amaningi ethu asekusizeni umuntu ohlulwa nosebenzisa izidakamizwa. Njengoba lokhu kubalulekile, wena nomndeni wakho nidinga ukwesekwa futhi! Thola usizo lwabantu bonke ngezansi: ⬇️

SourceText: Family life can be tough! 😣 Did you know that social workers at your local Department of Social Development can help with parenting skills, fatherhood, teenage pregnancy, and family or relationship counselling? If there isn’t a DSD office near you, NGOs in your area offer this support too. 🌍
text: Impilo yomndeni inzima! Ubuwazi ukuthi osohlalakahle kuMnyango Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi eduze nawe bangakusiza ngamakhono obuzali, ukuba ngubaba, ukumitha kwentsha, nokwelulekwa komndeni nobudlelwane? Uma lingekho i-ofisi lonoNhlalakahle eliseduze, ungathola usizo kuNGO eseduze nawe. 🌍

SourceText: Legal and SASSA issues can be stressful and confusing! 😵 There may be more support available than you realise at the organisations below: 👇
text: Izinkinga zomthetho neSASSA ziyakhathazana! Kungenzeka kubenokwesekwa okwengeziwe ngaphezu kolwazi lwakho kulezizindawo ngezansi: 👇

SourceText: Understanding sexual and gender development can be confusing and hard to talk about. 🌈 We’re all unique! Here’s some support and guidance: 💡
text: Ukuqondisisa ukuthuthuka kwezocansi nobulili kungadidana futhi kunzima ukukhuluma ngakho. Sonke sihlukile! Nakhu ukweseka nokwelulekwa: 💡

SourceText: School is where your child spends most of their time. 🏫 Making sure they are in school, happy, and supported is really important. If you're having trouble with any school issues, here’s some help: 📚
text: Ingane yakho ichitha isikhathi esiningi esikoleni. Kubalulekile ukuqiniseka ukuthi basesikoleni, bajabulile futhi bayasekwa. Uma unezinkinga nanoma iyiphi mayelana nokwesikole, nalu usizo: 📚

SourceText: I’m sorry that I cannot help with your challenge. If you want to access this information again, you can type {HELP} at any time.
text: Ngiyaxolisa ukuthi angikwazi ukukusiza ngenkinga yakho. Uma ufuna ulwazi futhi ungabhala {HELP} nanoma inini.

SourceText: I hope this was helpful! You can access this information at any time by typing {HELP}.
text: Sithemba ukuthi lokhu kube usizo! Ungafinyelela lolu lwazi noma nini ngokubhala ukuthi {HELP}.

SourceText: If you are facing challenges that are making it more difficult to focus on parenting, I have some resources that can help.
text: Uma uhlangabezana nobunzima okwenza kube nzima kakhulu ukugxila ebuzalini. Nginazo izinsiza ezingasiza.

SourceText: Thank you for letting us know.
That’s okay. These skills are hard at first. I encourage you to complete ParentText. If you still want more support, here are some parenting resources available:
text: Kulungile. Lamakhono anzima uma usaqala. Ngiyakugqugquzela ukuthi uyiqede iParentText. Uma usadinga okunye ukwesekwa, nazi ezinye izinsiza ezikhona:

SourceText: I hope this was helpful. See you tomorrow
text: Ngiyathemba lokhu kube wusizo. Sobonana kusasa

SourceText: Caring for a child with disabilities is challenging. Keep trying and remember to take care of yourself. Here are additional parenting resources for parents of children with special needs:
text: Ukunakekela ingane ekhubazekile kunzima. Qhubeka uzame ukhumbule ukuzinakekela. Nazi ezinye izinsiza zabazali bezingane eziphila nokukhubazeka:

SourceText: It’s great that you already know so much about parenting. More courses are released on ParentText all of the time. I will let you know when new ones are available. If you want to learn more now, you can join an in-person parenting programme near you:
text: Kuhle ukuthi usuwazi lukhulu ngobuzali. Ezinye izifundo ziyadedelwa kwi ParentText ngaso sonke isikhathi. Ngizokwazisa uma sekutholakala okusha. Uma ufuna ukufunda kabanzi manje, ungajoyina iqembu lohlelo lobuzali oluseduzane nawe:

SourceText: Caring for a child with disabilities is challenging. Keep trying and remember to take care of yourself.
text: Ukunakekela ingane ephila nokukhubazeka kunzima. Qhubeka uzame futhi ukhumbule ukuzinakekela

SourceText: Here are additional parenting resources for parents of children with special needs:
text: Nazi ezinye izinsiza zobuzali zabazali bezingane eziphila nokukhubazeka:

SourceText: I am sorry to hear that ParentText is not working on your phone. Here are a few steps you can try:
text: Ngiyaxolisa ukuzwa ukuthi i ParentText ayisebenzi efonini yakho. Nazi izinyathelo ezimbalwa ongazizama

SourceText: 1. Ensure you have the latest version of WhatsApp installed on your phone.
text: Qiniseka ukuthi unohlobo olusha luka WhatsApp efonini yakho

SourceText: 2. Check your internet connection to make sure it's stable.
text: Hlola i intanethi yakho ukuthi isezingeni elilungile.

SourceText: We're here to listen. Please tell how to make ParentText more helpful by sharing your feedback in a single message.
text: Sikhona ukulalela. Sicela usitshele ukuthi singayenza kanjani i ParentText ibe usizo noma ngomusho owodwa.

SourceText: Thank you for sharing your feedback.
Type 1 to resume the programme when you are ready!
text: Bhala u 1 ukuphinde uqale iprogrem uma usukulungele!

SourceText: 🎉You did it!🎉Congratulations for completing your first course!
The name you would like to have on your completion certificate is @fields.certificate_name. Is that correct?
text: Igama lakho ongathanda libe kusitifiketi sakho kanje @fields.certificate_name. Ingabe kulungile lokho?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.
